operations.title: Get Alerts
operations.description: Retrieves all the Alerts for a given Query and returns a Common Fields of Interests

parameters.name: cql_query
parameters.title: CQL Query
parameters.value: FROM alert WHERE severity >= 0.6 AND status = 'OPEN' EARLIEST=-1d
parameters.tooltip: Specify the CQL query to utilize when searching for Alerts. By default, It Queries for Alerts which are in OPEN state, have severity High/Critical and were created within 1 Day.
parameters.description: Specify the CQL query to utilize when searching for Alerts. By default, It Queries for Alerts which are in OPEN state, have severity High/Critical and were created within 1 Day.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.title: Limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of Alerts to be shown per page.
parameters.description: Specify the number of Alerts to be shown per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.title: Offset
parameters.description: Specify the offset result set requested. If your query has 500 total_results and you want the last 100; use offset:400 limit:100
